release.description: Compatible with SAGA Java Binding v1.1.1
release.action: Upgrade saga-api to version 1.1.1 (enable simultaneous usage of multiple SAGA implementations)
New URL implementation RFC-3986 compliant
New job adaptor for PBS batch system via SSH connection
CREAM adaptor now uses the standard staging directory
SSH and local adaptors now support offline monitoring
New security adaptor UserPassStore (based on Linux .netrc)
Remove dependency on JDK 1.6
Added configuration attribute "data.implicit.close.timeout"
Added supported features in jsaga-adaptor-linux module
Replace metric "job.sub_state" with standard metric "job.state_detail" with model "JSAGA"
Method Session.addContext() now initializes the context
Adaptor UserPass: user.name is now the default value for the user ID and there is no more default value for the password
Many bugfixes

release.description: New plug-ins for ARC and Unicore
release.action: Added adaptor for ARC (A-REX with BES interface)
Added adaptor for Unicore (with BES interface)
Use external LFC library

release.description: Compatible with SAGA Java Binding v1.1
release.action: Fix bugs related to delegation in CREAM adaptor.
Major performance improvements on LFC adaptor.
Fix bugs related to connection renewal in core engine.
Update SAGA Java Binding to version 1.1 (see https://git.in2p3.fr/public/jsaga/plain/saga-api/src/site/resources/CHANGES.txt).
Improvements and bugfixes on MyProxy adaptors.
Replace configuration engine

release.description: Same as 0.9.9, but built from GIT with maven 2.2.1
release.action: Use GIT instead of CVS
Use Maven 2.2.1 instead of 2.0.9
Improved data staging management in core engine.
Fix problem with data staging in WMS plug-in.
Added support for dCache implementation in SRM plug-in.
Added a per method/protocol configurable timeout.
Bugfixes and improvments on plug-ins.

release.description: Interface stabilized: SAGA Java Binding v1.0
release.action: Integrated version 1.0 of the reference Java Binding.
Added initial adaptor for NAREGI Super Scheduler.
Renamed configuration files (jsaga-engine.properties -> jsaga-config.properties, jsaga-config.xml -> jsaga-universe.xml)
Add support for GSI to iRoDS and SRB plug-ins.
Fixed dependencies management in GUI installer.

release.description: Initial implementation of job collection management

release.action: Added adaptors for SSH and fork.
Engine made compliant to 'snapshot-1' of SAGA Java Binding. Management of Job Collections is still under development...
Added adaptors for gLite WMS, Globus WS-GRAM and Unicore 6.
